entry.title: C/C++笔记
entry.content: C语言中字符串分割方法 1、要点主要应用strtok函数， 2、源码12345678910111213#include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){ char str[] = "now # is the time for all # good men to come to the # aid of their country"; char delims[] = "#"; char *result = NULL; result = strtok( str, delims ); while( result != NULL ) { printf( "result is \"%s\"\n", result ); result = strtok( NULL, delims ); } } 3、运行结果：
